itemDescription: British philatelist and Keeper of the Royal Philatelic Collection from 1938 to 1969

wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Mitchell Harvey Wilson, 2nd Baronet  (10 October 1898 – 6 February 1975) was a British philatelist and Keeper of the Royal Philatelic Collection from 1938 to 1969. He introduced the division of the collection by reign and, after World War II, loans from the collection to international exhibitions.
